name: Cosmic Contact
description:
This is a narrative focused game, with major inspiration from the first Alien movie and 2001: A Space Odyssey

You are Bowman, member of a freight spaceship crew. Take the time to know your crew better, but be weary of some unplanned events that can put the life of the crew at risk… Will you be able to withstand the anxiety of the Ử̵̧͚̤̘̹̺̰̜͂̈̅̇̿̇̕̕̚͜͠n̶̡̧̮̼̦̩͚͕̥͇̮͕̙̺̮̺̹̪̭͕̆̇͋̀̆̏̑̓̓̓͂͒͌͗̃̈́͝͠ͅͅk̵̨̡̛̝̠͎̦͈̻̬̹̰̩̜̯̾̿͂̓͗̄̅͋̇͋̇̃́̂̅͜͝ͅn̶̡̧̢̢̧̛͉̭̖̭͍̫̤̻̭̫̘̤͕͈͉͋̿̄̅̉̀̀̽͆̊̍̓̆͘̚͝͠͝o̷̗̥̫̼̅̊͐̍̈̾̆̕͝w̷̡̥̲̱̫̭̰͕̠̯̃̈̅̉͊̈̀̈́́̚̕͜͝n̶͉̙̺͈͇̅̎̒̒̔̍̃̉͂̅́̀́͠ ?

How to play

Play with WASD (or ZQSD for french people) to move, the mouse to look around, left click to passs dialogs and “E” to interact

ps : the lighting work better in exe version !

Credits:

Level/Game Design and Scripting by Kemsou and Akitl

Assets from syntystore.com and kenney.nl

Sounds from zapsplat.org

https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx

musics from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Mixamo for the animations
